00013 #include <Kernel/Types.hpp>
00014 
00015 class ByteBuffer {
00016 
00017     public:
00019         ByteBuffer();
00020 
00022         ByteBuffer(INT len, INT capacity = 0);
00023 
00025         ByteBuffer(const ByteBuffer& bbCopy);
00026 
00028         ByteBuffer(const ByteBuffer* bbCopy);
00029 
00031         ByteBuffer(const UINT8* buffer, INT len, INT capacity = 0);
00032 
00034         virtual ~ByteBuffer();
00035 
00037         ByteBuffer &    operator = (const ByteBuffer & bbCopy);
00038 
00040         UINT8 &         operator [] (INT idx);
00041 
00043         virtual BOOLEAN Append(UINT8    octet);
00044 
00046         virtual INT     GetLength() const { return m_buffer_len; }
00047 
00049         virtual UINT8*  GetData() const { return m_buffer; }
00050 
00052         virtual BOOLEAN IsEmpty() const { return m_buffer == 0; }
00053 
00055         virtual BOOLEAN IsEqualTo(const ByteBuffer &    rhs) const;
00056 
00058         virtual void    Swap(ByteBuffer &   swap_with);
00059 
00071         virtual BOOLEAN PreAlloc(INT    length,
00072                                  INT    capacity = 0);
00073 
00075         inline  INT     GetCapacity() const { return m_buffer_cap; }
00076 
00077         /*  @brief  Adjusts usable length of the buffer.
00078             
00079             When length is greater than the capacity of the buffer,
00080             a larger internal buffer will be allocated, otherwise
00081             just the length is adjusted and the capacity remains
00082             unchanged.
00083             
00084             @return \c 'TRUE' in case of success, \c 'FALSE' when
00085                     memory allocation failed - in this case the
00086                     object is not modified */
00087         virtual BOOLEAN SetLength(INT   length);
00088 
00098         inline  BOOLEAN Reserve(INT     capacity);
00099 
00100     protected:
00101         BOOLEAN         Allocate(INT  length, INT capacity = 0);
00102         BOOLEAN         Reallocate(INT  length, INT capacity);
00103         void            Free();
00104 
00105     private:
00106         UINT8 *         m_buffer;
00107         INT             m_buffer_len;
00108         INT             m_buffer_cap;
00109 };
00110 
00111 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00112     Reserve
00113     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00114 BOOLEAN ByteBuffer::Reserve(INT     capacity)
00115 {
00116     return  PreAlloc( GetLength(), capacity );
00117 }// Reserve
00118 
00119 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00120     operator==()
00121     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00122 inline  BOOLEAN operator==(const ByteBuffer &   lhs,
00123                            const ByteBuffer &   rhs)
00124 {
00125     return  lhs.IsEqualTo(rhs);
00126 }
00127 
00128 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00129     operator!=()
00130     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00131 inline  BOOLEAN operator!=(const ByteBuffer &   lhs,
00132                            const ByteBuffer &   rhs)
00133 {
00134     return  ! lhs.IsEqualTo(rhs);
00135 }
